description: In Superb running condition. Used as a Secondary vehicle. Beige Interior, Luxury Sedan (Very comfortable & Excellent for long drives), Kenwood Original Setup/CD Player, Central Locking, Power shutters, Remote key, Climate Controls, Front Fog Lamps. Fuel Consumption 10/11 KMPL in Colombo and 14/15 KMPL outstation drive.
name: Chevrolet Aveo  2008
